parameters.name: shares
parameters.description: Array of arrays, one per account user for whom sharing is enabled for this layout. Each string contains two fields separated by a comma. The first field is a user and and the second field are the list of permissions for the user. Two special user IDs exist: 'account' specifies that the layout is shared with all users of the account. The second field contains permissions for users in the account. Example: ['cafedead', 'RWDS'] = user can view, change, delete or share this layout. ['cafe0001', 'RW'] = user can view and change this layout. ['account', 'R'] = All users in the account can view the layout. Permissions for the user issuing the /layout GET are not included in this array.

types.description: Specifies target(s) for layout.  Multiple values are allowed.

json.description: String of JSON formatted data about the structure is included in the response

permissions.description: String of zero or more characters.  Each character defines a permission. Permissions include: 'R' - user can view this layout. 'W' - user can modify this layout. 'D' - user can delete this layout. 'S' - user can share this layout

shares.description: Array of arrays, one per account user for whom sharing is enabled for this layout.  Each string contains two field separated by comma.  The first field is a user aid and the second field are permissions for the user. Two special user ID exist: ‘account’ specifies that the layout is shared with all users of the account. Second field contains permissions for users in the account. Example: [‘cafedead’,’RWDS’] = user can view, change, delete or share this layout. [‘cafe0001’,’RW’] = user can view this layout and change this layout. [‘account’, ‘R’] = All users of the account can view this layout. Permissions for the user issuing the /layout GET are not included in this array.

type.description: ‘preview’ - shows live preview images form cameras. ‘carousel’- rotates between preview images, ids of cameras needs to be include in the cameras array along with an integer in the delay array.  The delay is an integer value of milliseconds as too how long the Camera will be displayed before switching to the next Camera.  A “carousel” with only one camera is the same as preview. ‘click’ - respond to click for other cameras in layout. ‘motion’ - respond to motion for other cameras in layout. ‘map’ - a static map with camera icons located on it. ‘url’ - displays the contents of the url in the pane as a frame.

pane_id.description: ID given to pane when created from Layout Manager

size.description: Size to display image: 1 = small, 2 = medium, 3 = large

cameras.description: Array of camera ids. For ‘carousel’, cycle through the camera ids with the delay setting in the corresponding ‘delay’ property

delay.description: Array of integers indicating amount of delay before changing to next camera image.  Time is in milliseconds.  Only used for type ‘carousel’

camera_row_limit.description: Max number of cameras to show per row
